apps

Class NamingServerApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • apps.NamingServerApp

  • public class NamingServerApp
extends Object
    Naming server application.

    The naming server application does not take any arguments. It starts a naming server listening on the default client and registration ports for clients and storage servers, respectively.

        Naming server application entry point.

      • serverType

        protected String serverType()
        Returns "naming".

      • startServer

        protected void startServer(String[] arguments)
                    throws apps.ServerApplication.BadUsageException,
                           RMIException
        Starts the naming server.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Command line arguments.
        Throws:
        BadUsageException - If there are any command line arguments.
        RMIException - If the naming server cannot be started.
        apps.ServerApplication.BadUsageException

      • stopServer

        protected void stopServer()
        Stops the naming server.

      • run

        protected void run(String[] arguments)
        Runs the application.

        This is the non-static replacement for the main method. It starts the server, starts a thread to wait for end-of-file for standard input, and waits until the server has terminated. Once the server terminates, this method prints a message indicating what kind of termination has occurred.

        Parameters:
        arguments - The command line arguments passed to main.

      • startTerminationTimer

        protected void startTerminationTimer()
        Schedules a task that will hard-terminate the JVM if the server fails to stop gracefully.

      • serverStopped

        protected void serverStopped(Throwable cause)
        Indicates that the server has stopped and wakes the waiting main thread.
        Parameters:
        cause - Exception that caused the server to stop, or null if the server stopped normally.
